entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:03 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 5:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
